title: Restarted to an earlier version
body: Riot i love your game , but why in the f*** does it restart my client to a later patch after crashing or a connection issue. patch 7.15 was like a 600mb total update and i had just been sent back having to install the patch again. We have terrible internet here in Australia and its really pissing me off that i have to wait several hours because of a crash having to reinstall the patch. Please Notice

replies.body: Sometimes that can happen when the client notices some corrupted or otherwise damaged game files lying about. It starts downloading the latest patch again in an effort to try and fix up anything that might have gone wrong, but it sounds like it hasn't quite been totally successful for you. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the option **force repatch** turned on and let me know how that helps!
